category-def.name: edu.tamu.tcat.dia
category-def.label: Document Image Analysis
category-def.description: SDK for the TCAT Document Imanage Analysis framework. This framework supports the development of reusable image analysis modules such as binarization, segmentation, and classifications for working with images of historical and modern documents. This framework is designed to support both research and rapid application development.

category-def.name: edu.tamu.tcat.dia.modules
category-def.label: TCAT DIA Modules
category-def.description: Implementations of specific document image analysis modules.
